triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: Core methodology reviewed in the survey for transferring knowledge across RL tasks to improve efficiency and effectiveness.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Fundamental learning paradigm for sequential decision-making problems that serves as the main subject of the survey.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Combination of deep learning and reinforcement learning that integrates transfer learning approaches to enable learning from complex, unstructured input.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Fast-developing field using deep neural networks that enables recent progress in reinforcement learning and facilitates transfer learning approaches.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: Application domain where reinforcement learning and transfer learning have demonstrated promising results for control and automation.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence in video games
triples.relevance: Game-playing domain where deep reinforcement learning with transfer learning has achieved notable successes like AlphaGo and Atari game mastery.
